pages.text:
Members, This Page Is For You!
We're pleased to be working on our new online billing and payment platform. Be sure you're getting our emails to get the information as soon as we go live.
Don't forget to keep an eye on your inbox and our Facebook page for all the spring events coming up.
Not a member yet? Call 850-997-5484 to learn more.
Want to check us out first? Residents of Jefferson County are allowed one visit annually at guest rates before membership is required. Non county residents are able to play as often as you'd like at guest rates.
Some of our upcoming events
● Weekly Men's Scramble
● April Fools Tournament
● Watermelon Festival Events
Come to Jefferson Country Club, where every visit is an opportunity to create stories that last a lifetime.

Jefferson Country Club
Whether you're a seasoned golfer, competitive tennis player, or looking for beautiful pool for your family's summer fun, Jefferson Country Club is proud to offer our facilities in Monticello, FL. We enjoy our small town feel that welcomes members and guests of all ages to enjoy our club and fellow members, and we think you will too.
Our club consists of a nine hole split tee design that offers the feel of a full 18 with reasonable rates for both members and guests. Our tennis courts and swimming pool are for members only, and because we are a semi-private club, we require residents of Jefferson County to hold a membership in order to play. Those residing outside of the county are able to play as often as they'd like at our standard guest rates. Tee times are recommended but not required; please call us at 850-997-5484.
Our bar area is open during normal club hours with snacks and drinks available on the go.
David Jackson, Golf Pro
David is a life long member of Jefferson Country Club who grew up roaming the fairways and was named to Golf Magazine's Junior All American Team. His next accomplishment was four years of play at the University of Florida, where he became a four time All American. David then played professionally for 10 years, including two years on the PGA Tour and eight years on the Hogan/Nike Tour where he won the 1992 Cleveland Open.
In his years of teaching golf, David has helped players at all skill levels improve their game and his success stories include five collegiate golfers including the 2023 Women's PGA Champion, Megan Schofield.
Please contact David at 850-528-0025 for more information on improving your game.
Richard McKee, Tennis Pro
Richard is the former men's tennis coach at Presbyterian College in Clinton, SC and Florida State University in Tallahassee and has taught since his own graduation from the University of North Carolina in 1974. During his time in Chapel Hill, Richard was a three time All American and was awarded the Atlantic Coast Conference Sportsmanship Award his senior year.
His teaching career has included lessons on prestigious courts such as Sea Pines Racquet Club in Hilton Head Island and the Florida Yacht Club in Jacksonville, and he currently splits his lessons between Jefferson Country Club in Monticello and Capital City Country Club in Tallahassee.
Please contact Richard at 850-251-2255 for more information on making tennis your sport.
Come to Jefferson Country Club, where every visit is an opportunity to create stories that last a lifetime.

Welcome to Jefferson Country Club, Monticello, FL
Where Tradition Meets Excellence in Golf
Join Our Club
About Us
Premier 9-Hole Split Tee Course
Experience the challenge and beauty of our meticulously designed 9-hole split tee course for players of all skill levels, and let our club pro help you master your swing.
Click here to learn about David Jackson.
Tennis Facilities
Engage in exhilarating tennis matches on our well-maintained courts, perfect for both casual and competitive play. Lessons are available from our highly qualified club pro.
Click here to learn more.
Relaxing Pool Area
Dive into relaxation at our serene swimming area with a separate kiddie pool, a perfect spot for leisure and family fun.
Exclusive Events
Join a vibrant community through a variety of social events, tournaments, and gatherings, some open to guests and others for members only. From our upcoming April Fool's Tournament to weekly trivia nights, c
lick here to see what's coming up!
/ ABOUT our course /
Experience the Charm of Our Semi-Private Club
Premier Florida Golfing Awaits
Nestled in the picturesque landscapes of Monticello, Florida, Jefferson Country Club has been a beacon of golfing excellence since its inception in 1964. Designed by the renowned Bill Amick, our 9-hole split tee course offers a unique blend of challenge and accessibility, surrounded by the natural beauty of Bermuda grass fairways and Tifdwarf greens.
Holes:
9, with split tees offering the feel of 18 holes.
Design:
Crafted by Bill Amick for an engaging golf experience.
Yardage:
3,124 yards from the longest tees.
Ratings:
Slope of 117 and a USGA rating of 34.2.
Tee Times:
Open to both members and the public.
Tee Details:
Red Tee (Women):
Par 36, 2,645 yards, Slope 115, Rating 34.3.
White Tee:
Par 36, 3,124 yards, Slope 117, Rating 34.2.
/ Events /
There's A Lot Going On at JCC!
Come experience our small town community with big happenings.
Home to the 2023 US Women's amateur champion
Megan Schofill
Coming Soon:
Weekly trivia night
every thursday
Social Events
Join Our Club Now
* Although we are a semi-private club, we do require Jefferson County residents to become members or be limited to two visits per year.
Join Our Club
Golf, Family, and Fun
Annual back to school ice cream social
Poolside fun
Course Manager Lee Howard in our new carts
Celebrating Monticello's yearly Watermelon festival
Competitive tournaments for members and guests
Driving range
/ golf rates /
Semi Private Pricing
Affordable rates for county residents and out of town guests alike.
MEMBERSHIP
$75
/ MONTHLY
$300 Initiation Fee
Pay for full year and get 1 month free!
MEMBER RATES
$18
/ FOR 18 HOLES with Cart
9 Holes with Cart  $12
Walking 9 Holes  $3
Weekend Rates:
$20 - 18 with Cart, $13 - 9 with Cart, $3 - Walking 9 Holes
GUEST RATES
$35
/ FOR 18 HOLES with Cart
9 Holes with Cart  $22
Walking 9 Holes $9
Weekend Rates:
$45 - 18 with Cart, $30 - 9 with Cart, $9 - Walking 9 Holes
/ GET IN TOUCH /
Contact Us
Feel free to contact us to ask a question or discuss any issue with our managers.
Location
748 Boston Hwy, Monticello, FL 32344
Call Us
(850) 997-5484

Upcoming Events
Check out our upcoming events.
8:00 am
April 6-7
April Fool's Tournament
Sign up today! Entries close April 3rd, $200 per person includes Best Ball Saturday and Scramble Sunday. 8am & 1pm shotgun start both days, includes lunch both days and live entertainment Saturday night! Call the club house at 850-997-5484 for more info or to get registered. This event is open to members only with a valid handicap.
8:00 am
Every Wednesday
Senior Play
Players 60+, 18 holes for $28. Call 850-997-5484.
8:00 am
Pool Opens!
Opening Day-TBA
Come kick off the summer for our annual pool opening party! This event is for members only. Don't want to miss it? Click here to join the club!
8:00 am
June 29-30
Watermelon Festival Tournament
Join us for this annual tournament that corresponds with Monticello's Watermelon Festival. It's a fun weekend for the whole family with community events, live music and great food! Join our email list for details coming soon!
TBA
August 2024
Three Man Tournament
Another annual tournament our members love, with details to be announced.
Come to Jefferson Country Club, where every visit is an opportunity to create stories that last a lifetime.
